name: Ruskin Hours
description: Ruskin Hours; Unknown; Northeastern France, France; about 1300; Tempera colors, gold leaf, and ink on parchment bound between wood boards covered with dark red leather (on inside covers, red morocco with ornament stamped in bold, from earlier 18th century binding); Leaf: 26.4 × 18.3 cm (10 3/8 × 7 3/16 in.); Ms. Ludwig IX 3; J. Paul Getty Museum, Los Angeles, California
title: Ruskin Hours
medium: Tempera colors, gold leaf, and ink on parchment bound between wood boards covered with dark red leather (on inside covers, red morocco with ornament stamped in bold, from earlier 18th century binding)
